title: CSU Channel Islands R Tools
text: can install development version csucistats GitHub : may also install package used quarto webr:

title: Unicorn Data — unicorn_data
Unicorn Data — unicorn_data
text: data frame 750 rows 15 variables: Unicorn_ID unique id number Age age years Gender gender unicorn (Female, Male, Non-Binary, Genderfluid, Agender) Color Color (White, Black, Gray, Brown, Pink, Gold, Silver Type_of_Unicorn type unicorn ? (Rainbow, Jewel, Ember, Ruvas) Type_of_Horn type horn ? (Opal Aquamarine) Horn_Length Length horn (inches) Horn_Strength Strength Horn (pascals) Weight Weight pounds Health_Score Unicorn's overal health (1-10) Personality_Score Personal unicorn? Magical_Score magical unicorn? Elusiveness_Score elusive unicorn? Gentleness_Score gentle unicorn? Nature_Score connected nature unicorn?
